question: i went to get the divorce papers from the office but they wouldnt give it to me unless i sign it. but the thing is i signed the papers so i could take it home
answer:
QUESTION
i have a question about divorce i went to get the divorce papers from the office but they wouldnt give it to me unless i sign it. but the thing is i signed the papers so i could take it home.so i dont know if we r divorced.
ANSWER


Share:

Your question is not clear. We are not sure what you signed for. If you signed a document confirming you having taken the divorce papers, then that will not constitute divorce as merely taking the divorce papers is not issuing a divorce.

If you signed a document confirming that you issued your wife a divorce, then that will constitute a divorce.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
